general.missing_permission: i need the **%1$s** permission in this **%2$s** to do that
general.missing_user_permission: you need the **%1$s** permission in this **%2$s** to do that
general.missing_argument: i couldn't figure out what you said for **%1$s**, try checking the **command usage**
general.owner_only: this command **can only be used** by **my owners**. nice try
general.interaction_error: uh oh, it looks like something **went wrong** behind the scenes. sorry about that
general.page_prompt: why don't you tell me what page you want to see?
general.blocked:
**%1$s** is no longer be able to use this feature. you have been blocked because of: **%2$s**
this message is considered fyi and you will not receive another

cat.description: gracefully displays a cat for your viewing pleasure

changes.description: learn more about my latest changes
changes.reply: you can learn more about the latest releases reading the documentation on our website

choose.description: randomly picks one of your words from a hat

options: the space separated list of words i will choose from

choose.reply: out of %1$s options in total, i decided to go with **%2$s**

clap.description: let me help you emphasize your important arguments

text: the text you would like to emphasize

clap.max_length: whoops, looks like what you said is **too long**

commands.description: glance through all my commands & categories

dog.description: fetches a dog from the depths of the internet

eval.description: evaluate an expression in a repl environment

script: the expression you want to evaluate

feedback.description: submit your feedback to the sandra developers
feedback.reply: please join our support server and talk about your concerns directly with **my developers**!!

flip.description: toss one of your coins to settle your bets
flip.no_credits: because you're broke, you don't have any coins to flip
flip.reply: your coin sparkled in the light as it danced along the ground until it landed with **%1$s** facing upwards

fortune.description: break open a fortune cookie to reveal your luck
fortune.reply:
as the cookie crumbles in your fingers, it reveals a piece of paper that reads

`%1$s`

help.description: look at some basic & essential info about me

command: the command you want to take a closer look at

help.not_found: whoops, i **couldn't find** that command. try using **/commands** to find what you're looking for
help.required_arguments: any options that are surrounded by <> are required
help.extra_help: need some extra help? chat with us

info_embed.title: *your favorite neighborhood robot* <:fun:987918991135764542>
info_embed.configure_content: > if you need to **configure** my **settings**, use `/config`
info_embed.commands_content: > or if you want to see my **command list**, use `/commands`
info_embed.invite_content: > would you like me to join **your server**? **[click to invite me](%1$s)**
info_embed.support_content: > need **more help**? chat with us in **[sandra's hangout](%1$s)**

members.description: gander at a breakdown of the server's member count
members.reply: **%1$s** has %2$s humans and %3$s bots for a total of %4$s members

mock.description: tHiS cOmMaNd Is SuCh A gOoD iDeA

text: tHe TeXt YoU wAnT tO mOcK

ping.description: sends a ping to test sandra's connection to discord
ping.reply: it took me %1$s to **ping discord** and about %2$s to **receive your command**

roll.description: test your luck with an imaginary dice set

sides: the number of sides your dice has

roll.reply: you took a chance and rolled a %1$s out of %2$s

shards.description: view a list of shards and their stats
shards.server_using: â€¢ this server is using shard %1$d

snowy.description: custom command for a good friend of mine
